events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department for further processing and evaluation.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the next stages of the hiring process for the software engineer role.
We conducted an initial screening interview to evaluate your technical background and cultural fit with our engineering team.
Thank you for promptly responding to our interview invitation and providing detailed answers to our preliminary technical questions.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our senior developers to assess your coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
